text: Mattia Trombetta (born 23 August 1974) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Como
title: Mattia Trombetta
